tests.description:
If start is positive, use min(start, length).
If deleteCount is positive, use min(deleteCount, length - start)

If start is negative, use max(start + length, 0).
If deleteCount is negative, use 0

If deleteCount is negative, use 0

If start is negative, use max(start + length, 0).
If deleteCount is positive, use min(deleteCount, length - start)
